Reviews.Title: Not what I expected from HP
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Martin
Reviews.Content: The CD drive doesn't work properly. The Internet moves very slowly and freezes often. Usually will not open a different page within a website. Extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: marcia
Reviews.Content: i am really enjoying my new computer, i had an HP before, decide to go bigger, and i am loving it. the only con is Microsoft, i did not know i have to purchase the program. first time i had windows eight, not disappoint, just it a package.

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD Quad-Core A8-4500M Accelerated Processor 1.9GHz up to 2.8GHz
17.3-inch diagonal HD+ BrightView LED-backlit display (1600 x 900)
4GB DDR3L SDRAM / 500GB Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection
SuperMulti DVD burner / HP TrueVision HD Webcam with microphone
Windows 8.1 64-bit / 802.11b/g/n WLAN
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion 17-e134nr 17.3" Laptop PC - AMD Quad-Core A8 / 4GB Memory / 500GB HD / SuperMulti DVD Drive / HD Webcam & Microphone / Windows 8.1
